text: Rubén Cordano Justiniano (born 16 October 1998) is a Bolivian professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Club Blooming and the Bolivia. ==International career== Cordano made his senior debut for the Bolivia national football team in a 1-0 friendly loss to South Korea on 22 March 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Bolivian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Bolivian Primera División players Category:Club Blooming players Category:Bolivia international footballers Category:Bolivia youth international footballers
title: Rubén Cordano
